response.overview: I got back to my hometown Yang'e Village in Shunde and shot some landscapes for my future works in the 2019 Spring Festival (Feb. 5th exactly). This video work consists of some footages I shot in the Kanggong Temple and near the Yang'e Food Market. By this simple video work, I want to explore the relationship among the religion, geography, and animals, especially the animals' traces and roles in the domain of beliefs. This video work was selected in the 2019 23rd Wusanto Film Festival in Taiwan. (Wrote by Xiong Zaixia)
response.title: RELIGEOZOON
